Label: SC_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "All 116XXX, ""European harmonized services of social"" value are toll-free.\nSee: https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/116-helplines."

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "For easier maintenance, supporting ranges at 3 digit granularity vs 4 digit granular\nranges mentioned in RAK's doc."

Label: XML_SHARED_COST
Comment: "Using this category to model national tariff numbers - these are under Shared Cost in\nthe plan."

Label: XML_UAN
Comment: "Using this to classify nomad numbers. 702[0-4] ranges are no longer mentioned in\nofficial RAK's doc (Dated 21-11-2017). For easier maintenance, supporting ranges at 4\ndigit granularity vs 4 and 5 digit granular ranges mentioned in RAK's doc."
